topic.title: Glasgow Coma Score Organizer - conformance rules

lines.i: Collection of Glasgow Coma Score observations

ol.li:
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.170"

SHALL contain [1..1] component (CONF:10313)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Glasgow Eye (templateId: 2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.160)

SHALL contain [1..1] component (CONF:10314)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Glasgow Motor (templateId: 2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.192)

MAY contain [0..*] component (CONF:10315)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Glasgow Qualifier (templateId: 2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.159)

SHOULD contain [0..1] component (CONF:10316)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Glasgow Total (templateId: 2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.158)

SHALL contain [1..1] component (CONF:10317)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Glasgow Verbal (templateId: 2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.162)

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] effectiveTime (CONF:11313)
NEMSIS Trace: EVitals.01

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] effectiveTime (CONF:11313)
NEMSIS Trace: EVitals.01

SHALL contain [1..1] component (CONF:10313)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Glasgow Eye (templateId: 2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.160)

SHALL contain [1..1] component (CONF:10314)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Glasgow Motor (templateId: 2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.192)

MAY contain [0..*] component (CONF:10315)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Glasgow Qualifier (templateId: 2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.159)

SHOULD contain [0..1] component (CONF:10316)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Glasgow Total (templateId: 2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.158)

SHALL contain [1..1] component (CONF:10317)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Glasgow Verbal (templateId: 2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.162)

body.codeblock: <organizer xmlns="urn:hl7-org:v3"> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.170"/> <statusCode code="completed"/> <effectiveTime> <low value="2015"/> <high value="2015"/> </effectiveTime> <component> <observation moodCode="EVN"> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.160"/> <code code="9267-6" codeSystem="2.16.840.1.113883.6.1" codeSystemName="LOINC" displayName="Glasgow coma score.eye opening"/> <text>Text Value</text> <effectiveTime> <low value="2015"/> <high value="2015"/> </effectiveTime> </observation> </component> <component> <observation moodCode="EVN"> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.192"/> <code code="9268-4" codeSystem="2.16.840.1.113883.6.1" codeSystemName="LOINC" displayName="Glasgow coma score.motor"/> <text>Text Value</text> <effectiveTime> <low value="2015"/> <high value="2015"/> </effectiveTime> </observation> </component> <component> <observation moodCode="EVN"> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.159"/> <code code="55285-1" codeSystem="2.16.840.1.113883.6.1" codeSystemName="LOINC" displayName="Glasgow coma score special circumstances"/> <text>Text Value</text> <effectiveTime> <low value="2015"/> <high value="2015"/> </effectiveTime> </observation> </component> <component> <observation moodCode="EVN"> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.158"/> <code code="9269-2" codeSystem="2.16.840.1.113883.6.1" codeSystemName="LOINC" displayName="Glasgow coma score.total"/> <text>Text Value</text> <effectiveTime> <low value="2015"/> <high value="2015"/> </effectiveTime> </observation> </component> <component> <observation moodCode="EVN"> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.162"/> <code code="9270-0" codeSystem="2.16.840.1.113883.6.1" codeSystemName="LOINC" displayName="Glasgow coma score.verbal"/> <text>Text Value</text> <effectiveTime> <low value="2015"/> <high value="2015"/> </effectiveTime> </observation> </component> </organizer>
